content:
System.Activities.Presentation.Debug Namespace

Definition

Provides classes related to presentation debugging.

In this Article

Classes

DebuggerService

Manages the placement of breakpoints for a debugging process.

Interfaces

IDesignerDebugView

Provides functionality for an activity designer debugger view.

Enums

BreakpointTypes

Represents an enumeration that provides settings for breakpoints.
